message_1: Given a message "HELLO" and a key of 3, apply the Caesar cipher encryption technique to get the encrypted message.
message_2:
To apply the Caesar cipher encryption technique with a key of 3, shift each letter in the message "HELLO" 3 positions forward in the alphabet.

H -> K
E -> H
L -> O
L -> O
O -> R

The encrypted message is "KHOOR".
